creator: mattapalli@gmail.com
text:
HI 
I am accessing images from my local server by specifying the images path like
http://localhost:9080/images/hh.gif ,FO generating the pdf with images.But 
whenever I try to access from otherServer its showing errors in the console 
like no base url specified.
I have a scenario like generating a pdf from reading images from public urls 
like reading a image from http://www.google.be/images/hp0.gif
.
Is there any way to resolve this issue.
Thanks in advance
regards
sudhakar

creator: jeremias@apache.org
text:
Works for me. No problem accessing images on another server with the kind of URL
you used and FOP 0.20.5. "showing errors" is quite unspecific and not really
helpful. Please take this to the fop-users@ mailing list and include the error
messages you get, Java version, operating system and a small FO file that shows
the problem. Also, try to reproduce this on your system from the command-line.
Tests like that can reveal differences that may affect your server system.

creator: gadams@apache.org
text: batch transition to closed remaining pre-FOP1.0 resolved bugs
